name: Bismuth Labs
description:
Bismuth Labs WE DID IT! We are going to make millions on this, son. Quick, contain it in that black hole before we lose the planet.
- Mr. Johnson Jr.

Bismuth Labs has created a new prototype world-rolling ball that is poised to revolutionize the ball rolling industry. Unfortunately, the world becomes unstable when it is rolled too quickly.

In order to conform to the specifications set forth in the Ball Rolling Society's Compendium of Rolling Balls, you must pilot this world-rolling ball through a strenuous test course.

Objective:

Roll the white ball into the yellow cube without destabilizing the world.

Controls: ForwardWLeft Move Mouse LeftBackwardSRightMove Mouse Right
